text: KOYT-LP (97.1 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Anza, California. The station is owned by Anza Community Broadcasting. It airs a variety radio format. The station was assigned the KOYT-LP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on October 2, 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * OYT-LP OYT-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2016 Category:2016 establishments in California Category:Variety radio stations in the United States Category:Riverside County, California
title: KOYT-LP
